    class Logger::Formatter

    Default formatter for log messages.

    Constants

    Format

    Attributes

    datetime_format[RW]

    new() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/logger/formatter.rb, line 10
def initialize
  @datetime_format = nil
end

    Public Instance Methods

    call(severity, time, progname, msg) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/logger/formatter.rb, line 14
def call(severity, time, progname, msg)
  Format % [severity[0..0], format_datetime(time), $$, severity, progname,
    msg2str(msg)]
end

    Private Instance Methods

    format_datetime(time) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/logger/formatter.rb, line 21
def format_datetime(time)
  time.strftime(@datetime_format || "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N ")
end
    msg2str(msg) click to toggle source 
    # File lib/logger/formatter.rb, line 25
def msg2str(msg)
  case msg
  when ::String
    msg
  when ::Exception
    "#{ msg.message } (#{ msg.class })\n#{ msg.backtrace.join("\n") if msg.backtrace }"
  else
    msg.inspect
  end
end
